casebody.data:
No. 09-11123. Mark E. Allen, Petitioner v. Brian Coleman, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Fayette, et al. 562 U.S. 862, 131 S. Ct. 144,

178 L. Ed. 2d 86,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6231. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
